knimeNode.name: Heuristics Miner
knimeNode.shortDescription: This nodes implements the HeuristicsMiner to discover process models.

fullDescription.intro:
This nodes implements the Heuristics Miner to discover process models. Heuristics Miner is an algorithm that acts on the Directly-Follows Graph, providing way to handle with noise and to find dependency between activities. An heuristics net or causal net is the output, which is a directed graph with activities as nodes, dependency interpreted as arcs and bindings. The Heuristics Net can be then converted into a Petri net.
The node Heuristics Miner shows the Heuristics Net as one internal result in View "Heuristic Net", while it outputs a Petri net after implicit conversion.
